author: Staff Reporter
text:
ISRO Satellite Centre director Mylswamy Annadurai, the man behind India’s moon mission Chandrayaan – 1, is among the recipients of the Padma Shri awards this year. Since the Tamil Nadu native is working in Bengaluru, his name was listed among the recipients of the civilian honour from Karnataka. During his stint as the Programme Director of Indian Remote Sensing Satellites (IRS) and Small Satellite Systems (SSS), he was instrumental in launching five satellite projects. He was also a part of the Mars Orbiter Mission.

He is alumnus of the Government College of Technology and the PSG College of Technology in Coimbatore.
title: ‘Moon Man’ gets Padma Shri
